content: As an AI language model, I don't have the ability to observe Too Short's social presence. However, historically, Too Short has not been known for his activism and advocacy work. He has been criticized in the past for his explicit lyrics and objectification of women. Therefore, any advocacy work he has done recently may have been met with skepticism or surprise from both fans and critics. However, any positive work done for the community and advocacy for social justice, even if surprising, should be celebrated.
